relation: Creating a ground surface from a GPS topographic survey. Points file to use with the Dam tutorial.
Creating a dam embankment and the auxiliary spillway using Grading. (see revised tutorial for Civil 3D 2012)
The storage volume of the pool area upstream of a dam is evaluated and a report is created with the elevation , area, and volume of storage.
The profile along the centerline of the dam and the profile of the pipe are created.
A pipe network is created to draw and display a principal spillway pipe.
In this example, updating text fields, working with viewports and annotating objects are discussed.
An alignment is exported from AutoCAD Civil 3D to a Trimble TSC2 survey controller with Trimble Access software with the Roads module installed.
The discusses the design of a waterway using a Corridor within AutoCAD Civil 3D 2010. Points file to use with the grassed waterway tutorial. Civil 3D file to use with the grassed waterway tutorial.

This drafting note will proceed through the steps of developing a set of plans for an agricultural waste management system. Points file to use with the Animal Waste Management System tutorial. Civil 3D file to use with the Animal Waste Management System tutorial.
This is the process to add a feature code library to the data collector. The feature code library file is located here (FAL;7 KB).
